product_name: Club Ride Pure West Bike Jersey - Men's
long_description: The Club Ride Pure West Bike Jersey transforms a classic Western-style shirt into a stealth pedaler. You'll arrive cool, dry and ready to boogie-or swing dance. Lightweight, breathable polyester fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and offers UPF 30 sun protection. Mesh along the sides and under the arms vents excess heat. Stretch fabric frees up your movements. Hidden front zipper system enhances airflow. 2 rear zippered pockets secure essentials; 1 has a media port for off-bike listening. Club Ride Pure West Bike Jersey features a patterned front and back yoke and a comfortable fit.
short_description: The Club Ride Pure West Bike Jersey transforms a classic Western-style shirt into a stealth pedaler. You'll arrive cool, dry and ready to boogie-or swing dance.
